remarks: Functor composition is associative.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofuass.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
cofuass.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( D Func E ) ) $.
cofuass.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( E Func F ) ) $.
cofuass $p |- ( ph -> ( ( K o.func H ) o.func G ) = ( K o.func ( H o.func G ) ) ) $.
